content_descriptors.notes: The game focuses on the theme of war and suffering hence it is advised that the users be above the age of 18+ and be ready to experience animated and/or worldly descriptions of war and the suffering that it brings.

fullgame.name: Niara: Rebellion Of the King Visual Novel RPG

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: This is a Renpy game. If your computer can run other Renpy games then it will be able to run this one too.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • Additional Notes: This is a Renpy game. If your computer can run other Renpy games then it will be able to run this one too.
